title: Home
description: East West Natural Medicine serving all of your needs in Santa Rosa. Call us today at 707-978-4293 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to East West Natural Medicine! A holistic way to improving your health You can send an email directly to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#76181f15191a1317181213040519181a171536111b171f1a5815191b) WHO WE ARE We are located in the heart of Santa Rosa. At East West Natural Medicine we are dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives -- combining skill and expertise that span acupuncture and Chinese medicine. Jessica Piazza L.Ac. and her team of compassionate healthcare providers genuinely care about you and your health. Their primary goal is to educate you about what your body is communicating through the signs and symptoms you are experiencing. Through this process we empower our patients to live a more embodied life and to have greater control of their health. WHAT WE OFFER We treat a wide range of health concerns including: male and female health, anti-aging, pain management, sports injuries, psychological/emotional disorders, addiction, weight loss, gastrointestinal disorders, asthma, allergies, colds and flus. Together, we can create a comprehensive, preventative treatment program to support your greater health and well being. If you are new to our website, please feel free to discover and learn about Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) and Integrative Medicine (IM). It's Your Life... Live it Well! Best, Piazza Bitz-Hay Our Office Manager Extraordinaire Santa Rosa Acupuncturists | East
